title: Where is the service center in vishakpatnam ?
content: I bought  pixel 3a 5 months before  now my mobile screen was turns black colour . lost visbility i dint  see anything  it turns  black but  touch works. i did the hard rest but didnt work . no dent and scratche on mobile. squeezes are works when squeeze  and finger print  sensor  works and vibrates. Now i want to take my mobile  to service  center  to solve the problem.
